Package maldiniPaone.servlets.managers.interfaces

Interface ManageAccountModification

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserManager
public interface ManageAccountModification
This interface defines the signatures of the methods to modify users and delete users

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean forgotPassword​(java.lang.String oldUsername, UserType user, java.lang.String newPassword)
    Modify Account when forgot old password
    boolean modifyUserCredentials​(java.lang.String oldUsername, java.lang.String oldPassword, java.lang.String newUsername, java.lang.String newPassword, java.lang.String newEmail, UserType user)
    modifies credentials and email of a user
    boolean removeUser​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, UserType user)
    Removes a user given its username and password

  • Method Details

    • modifyUserCredentials

      boolean modifyUserCredentials​(java.lang.String oldUsername, java.lang.String oldPassword, java.lang.String newUsername, java.lang.String newPassword, java.lang.String newEmail, UserType user) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      modifies credentials and email of a user
      Parameters:
      oldUsername - : the old username of the user
      oldPassword - : the old password of the user
      newUsername - : the new username to be set
      newPassword - : the new password to be set
      newEmail - : the new email address to be set(null if no change)
      user - : the type of use to be modified
      Returns:
      true if the modification is successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • removeUser

      boolean removeUser​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, UserType user) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Removes a user given its username and password
      Parameters:
      username - : the user name of the user to be deleted
      password - : the password of the user to be deleted
      user - : the user type of the user to be deleted
      Returns:
      boolean: true if the deletion is successful, false if fails
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • forgotPassword

      boolean forgotPassword​(java.lang.String oldUsername, UserType user, java.lang.String newPassword) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Modify Account when forgot old password
      Parameters:
      oldUsername - : the old user name of the user to be modified
      user - : the type of the user that must be modified
      newPassword - : the new password to be set
      Returns:
      boolean : true if the update is successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)
